document_data.name: Gundwynd
document_data.symbol: Red and orange spiral winds surrounding a golden sun against a white field.
document_data.mainbody: '''Gundwynd''' ({{Pronounce|GUND|wind|refs=}}) was a notable [[Waterdhavian]] noble house that specialized in the procurement and sale of aerial steeds, particularly [[hippogriff]]s.
document_data.Base of Operations: The family owned a villa in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], at the corner of [[Vondil Street]] and [[Mendever Street]].
document_data.Relationships:
House Gundwynd was one of the seven<ref> Waterdhavian noble houses that made up the [[Two-Cities Consortium]] that controlled trade between Waterdeep and [[Skullport]].<ref>{{Cite dungeon/128/Vampires of Waterdeep: The Fireplace Level|75}}

[[Myrnd Gundwynd]] was the leader of the [[Black Boar]] mercenaries operating out of the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]].<ref>
